CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Hours_of_work_completed_timeslot_1__c ) ,"", TEXT(Hours_of_work_completed_timeslot_1__c) & ' hours ' &BR() ) & IF( ISBLANK( Hours_of_work_completed_timeslot_2__c ) ,"", TEXT(Hours_of_work_completed_timeslot_2__c) & ' hours ' &BR() )& IF( ISNULL( Fixed_price_charge__c ) ,"", ' 1 ' &BR() )
CustomField.label: NEW Labour quantity formula
